about.title: About
about.description: I'm passionate about bringing ideas to life through code and technology. Whether it's building websites, apps, or software, I love the process of creating and sharing knowledge. I enjoy immersing myself in new topics and experiences, and I'm equally enthusiastic about teaching and sharing my expertise with others.

friends.title: Friends
friends.description: Welcome to the vibrant community of friends and colleagues who are an integral part of my journey! Here you can discover a diverse network of connections, each representing unique perspectives, talents, and passions.
